On average, for every 4 sports cars sold at the local dealership, 7 sedans are sold. The dealership predicts that it will sell 28 sports cars next month. How many sedans does it expect to sell?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  7  \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\   32  \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\   35  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\  49   \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  112$
